text: Ra u nai ho jasale aphno anukampa (barsa) bhanda agadi vayula'i subhasucanako rupama patha'umdacha. Yahamsam'ma ki jaba tyasale thula–thula badalaharula'i ucalera lya'umcha taba hamile tyasala'i e'uta kunai sukhkha bhu–bhagatira patha'idinchau. Tyasapachi badalaharubata brsti gara'umchau, ani tyasa barsako jalabata thari–tharika phala utpanna gardachaum. Yasai prakara hamile mrtakaharula'i (jivita pari) bahira nikalne chaum. Asa cha ki timile sadupadesa grahana garnechau
